events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your skills and experience submitted in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering positions has been assigned to your profile and will be reaching out shortly.
We completed the initial screening of your application. Your software development experience aligns well with our job requirements.
Thank you for your quick response and for confirming your availability for a technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC with our senior software development team.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback about your problem-solving skills and development knowledge.
The HR interview is scheduled for April 24th at 3 PM UTC, where we will discuss your career aspirations and company culture fit.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with constructive conversation about your future goals and alignment with our values.
We have formally proposed an offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary details and benefits tailored to your experience.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team has been noted.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are excited to have you start your career as part of our software development team.
Your onboarding process has started with access to our engineering systems and initial training sessions scheduled.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome officially onboard as a Software Engineer on our development team.
